title: Can The Cowboys Be Good? TNF Preview
description:
Pablo Torre, Domonique Foxworth and Mina Kimes debate if their opinion has changed on how good this Cowboys team can be and if they think the Bengals or Dolphins offense is better going into their Thursday Night matchup, Plus, a NBA Media Day recap.

itunes:subtitle: (debatable): Are The Cowboys Actually Good? Previewing TNF
